Hi Grim, Thanx for a *great* download package and instructions. I hope you can help with a problem. I burned an install dvd (4X speed and verified) and it loaded fine. First key worked great and it appeared to do a normal install (I didn't load all the programs, just Acrobat, DW, PS, ID, Illustrator). 

Got a string of error messages at the end showing that only Acrobat loaded. Tried to run Acrobat but got a message saying another CS3 component must be run before Acrobat will work. Well no others loaded so that was out.

Rebooted and tried to repair install from Control Panel but got kicked out because "Creative Suite Master Collection is not loaded" (you can see this in the error screen shot below). So restarted and went from DVD again. It looked like everything was working...took long as hell (as usual) but all errors.

I'm in the Grim Reaper's hands now. (-;  Thank you for helping starving artists!

Still hacking around. Acrobat and DW will open perfectly...until the error pops up "Licensing for the product has stopped working - You cannot use the product at this time. You must repair the problem by uninstalling and then reinstalling this product or contacting your IT supervisor." Yikes.

Final update. Did complete uninstall for 3rd time. This time, rather than put in keygen serial at beginning I tried to install "As trial version" planning to activate with this or another CS3 keygen.

Didn't get that far. This version is simply not installing the main CS3 Master Collection component or fonts. Probably not an error by Grim, since this obviously worked before. Perhaps Adobe did something?

LOL works fine idk why the keygen got flagged by some peoples AV i use ESET SS not shyt avg ty grim.....i didn't burn it to dvd just mounted with deamon tools and all installed OK did take over an hour though...

Can I install CS3 or does it also requieres SP1?

Thanks in advance for your help.
i tried everything but not activate! After a 30 days it locked. I made a new download but still does n't work with the activations numbers. Can you help me grim. Thank's anyway

@luisrrjjcc  this is what I read, copy and pasted 4 u 
Microsoft Windows XP with Service Pack 3; Windows Vista Home Premium, Business, Ultimate, or Enterprise with Service Pack 1 (Service Pack 2 recommended); or Windows 7
therefore, yes it requires the Service Packs to install CS4, even CS3, and of course CS5.

Also, 64-bit edition of Windows Vista/Windows 7 required for Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects.
Hope this helps:)

To everyone else having issues regarding activation/activating my torrent CS3 Master, you should not having any issues with the keygen I provided with CS3 Master.
When installing CS3 Master (offline), or when it prompts you to enter serial number, generate a serial number, enter it.
When finished installing, go look for updates, then block AdobeUpdater after. 
Enjoy:)
